body_html:
Hm, yes this is something that we want to be able to handle better in the future in distribution strategy code. However, until now we've been relying on the high level API infrastructure to deal with this. For e.g. I think estimator has some logic which stops the training when OutOfRange is encountered.
@yuefengz any idea why this error shows up only in collective ops strategy and not others?

body:
Hm, yes this is something that we want to be able to handle better in the future in distribution strategy code. However, until now we've been relying on the high level API infrastructure to deal with this. For e.g. I think estimator has some logic which stops the training when OutOfRange is encountered.
@yuefengz any idea why this error shows up only in collective ops strategy and not others?
